name: Bubbleman (Shatzune)
description:
Bubbleman - a 20 second Game Jam submission

Reach the portal in 20 seconds!

Command list

  • Left and right: arrow keys (keyboard)  /  left - right buttons (gamepad)
  • Jump/Double jump: C ,  up arrow (keyboard)  /  A button (gamepad)
  • Attack: V (keyboard) /  X button (gamepad)

Credits

Programming, music and pixel art by Shatzune

Except the portal sprite made by Grappe
